name: Clan Party
description:
Clan Party

The Goal: Recruit the clans, slay the monsters, win!

Difficulty: It's a bit easy, should probably have scrapped the restart button and made it a roguelike. Try restarting each level to clear your troops from the last one for a slightly harder challenge.

The Theme: You join the clans together into a party.

Controls:

  • WASD:  Move
  • Mouse: Look & Interact

Tools Used: Godot Engine (Mono version), Inkscape, Kenney roguelike pack

Attributions: Thanks to kenney.nl for the free roguelike asset pack, used for creating the floor.
